title: Pint Night This Thursday @ 5pm!
body_md: Albert G's Downtown - featuring **COOP Blood Orange Horny Toad Ale**. $5/pint and keep the glass!

title: Over 100 Bourbons - Scan. Sip. Rate. Repeat.
body_md:
Welcome to the **G's Bourbon Club** experience!

Go to [**You**](https://badjupiter.cloud/bourbon#me) and scan your bar receipt after each new bourbon - we'll keep a list for you here of everything you've tried! Long-press any pour to assign your personal star rating.

Check out [**Favorites**](https://badjupiter.cloud/bourbon#topten) to see what other club members are sipping.

title: Welcome to the Bourbon Club!
body_md: Scan you bar receipt each time you try a new bourbon, and we'll keep a list for you right here of everything you've tried! You can even assign stars to note what you thought about each. There's a Leader Board to give some props to the most adventurous players. But best of all, you'll get invitations to events, specials, and new releases!

title: Friday Thing
body_md: This one is only going to show up on Friday. Just a little test of the date filtering stuff.
